languages.text: "Ха-ха, ха-ха-ха, очень смешно. Даже наш дорогой Капеллан не предлагает мне покаяться — он давно поставил на мне крест. А уж батюшка и подавно!" {n}Мужчина нервно смеется.{/n} "Хотя, погодите... вы про то "покаяние"? Про долбаных призраков, или что это было? Да думаю, это сам батюшка творил в старческом маразме, или дочка моя баловалась. Откуда еще взяться этим надписям?"

"Ha ha, ha ha ha, that's hilarious. Even good old Chaplain doesn't tell me to repent — he gave up on me long ago. And my old dad, he gave up on me long before that!" {n}He laughs nervously.{/n} "Wait... you mean that 'repentance'? Those stupid ghosts or whatever it was? I'm pretty sure my father did it himself, the senile old kook, or maybe it was my daughter messing around. Where else could those words have come from?"
languages.original_text: "Ха-ха, ха-ха-ха, очень смешно. Даже наш дорогой Капеллан не предлагает мне покаяться — он давно поставил на мне крест. А уж батюшка и подавно!" {n}Мужчина нервно смеется.{/n} "Хотя, погодите... вы про то "покаяние"? Про долбаных призраков, или что это было? Да думаю, это сам батюшка творил в старческом маразме, или дочка моя баловалась. Откуда еще взяться этим надписям?"

traits.locale_text: "Haha, hahaha, that's hilarious. Even our dearest Chaplain doesn't tell me to repent — he gave up on me long ago. And Papa even longer than that!" {n}He laughs nervously.{/n} "Wait... you mean that 'repentance'? Those stupid ghosts or whatever it was? I'm pretty sure Papa himself did it, the senile old kook, or maybe it was my daughter's antics. Where else could those words have come from?"

"Haha, hahaha, that's hilarious. Even our dearest Chaplain doesn't tell me to repent — he gave up on me long ago. And Papa even longer than that!" {n}He laughs nervously.{/n} "Wait... you mean that 'repentance'? Those stupid ghosts or whatever it was? I'm pretty sure Papa himself did it, the senile old kook, or maybe it was my daughter's antics. Where else could those words have come from?"

"Ha ha, ha ha ha, that's hilarious. Even good old Chaplain doesn't tell me to repent — he gave up on me long ago. And my old dad, he gave up on me long before that!" {n}He laughs nervously.{/n} "Wait... you mean that 'repentance'? Those stupid ghosts or whatever it was? I'm pretty sure my father did it himself, the senile old kook, or maybe it was my daughter messing around. Where else could those words have come from?"

"Ha ha, ha ha ha, that's hilarious. Even good old Chaplain doesn't tell me to repent — he gave up on me long ago. And my old dad, he gave up on me long before that!" {n}He laughs nervously.{/n} "Wait... you mean that 'repentance'? Those stupid ghosts or whatever it was? I'm pretty sure my father did it himself, the senile old kook, or maybe it was my daughter messing around. Where else could those words have come from?"

"Ha ha, ha ha ha, that's hilarious. Even good old Chaplain doesn't tell me to repent — he gave up on me long ago. And my old dad, he gave up on me long before that!" {n}He laughs nervously.{/n} "Wait... you mean that 'repentance'? Those stupid ghosts or whatever it was? I'm pretty sure my father did it himself, the senile old kook, or maybe it was my daughter messing around. Where else could those words have come from?"

languages.text: “哈哈，哈哈哈，我要笑死了。就算是善良的老牧师也不会叫我忏悔，他早就不管我了。至于我那个老爹，他甚至在这之前就不管我了！”{n}他紧张地大笑起来。{/n}“等等……你指的是那个‘忏悔’吗？你是说那些愚蠢的幽灵还是什么的？我敢肯定，那些东西是他自己搞出来的，那个老态龙钟的老顽固。噢，也可能是我女儿在调皮捣蛋，不然那些字还能是谁写的？”
languages.original_text: "Ha ha, ha ha ha, that's hilarious. Even good old Chaplain doesn't tell me to repent — he gave up on me long ago. And my old dad, he gave up on me long before that!" {n}He laughs nervously.{/n} "Wait... you mean that 'repentance'? Those stupid ghosts or whatever it was? I'm pretty sure my father did it himself, the senile old kook, or maybe it was my daughter messing around. Where else could those words have come from?"

traits.locale_text: “哈哈，哈哈哈，我要笑死了。就算是善良的老牧师也不会叫我忏悔，他早就不管我了。至于我那个老爹，他甚至在这之前就不管我了！”{n}他紧张地大笑起来。{/n}“等等……你指的是那个‘忏悔’吗？你是说那些愚蠢的幽灵还是什么的？我敢肯定，那些东西是他自己搞出来的，那个老态龙钟的老顽固。噢，也可能是我女儿在调皮捣蛋，不然那些字还能是谁写的？”

languages.text: «Ja, ja, ja, qué ocurrencia. Ni el bueno de Capellán me dice ya que me arrepienta; me dio por perdido hace mucho. ¡Y mi viejo lo hizo mucho antes!». {n}Se ríe, nervioso.{/n} «Alto... ¿se refiere a ese "arrepentimiento"? ¿Esos estúpidos fantasmas o lo que fueran? Estoy convencido de que fueron cosa de mi padre senil, o, si no, era mi hija gastando una broma. ¿De dónde si no habría salido esa palabra?».
languages.original_text: "Ha ha, ha ha ha, that's hilarious. Even good old Chaplain doesn't tell me to repent — he gave up on me long ago. And my old dad, he gave up on me long before that!" {n}He laughs nervously.{/n} "Wait... you mean that 'repentance'? Those stupid ghosts or whatever it was? I'm pretty sure my father did it himself, the senile old kook, or maybe it was my daughter messing around. Where else could those words have come from?"

traits.locale_text: «Ja, ja, ja, qué ocurrencia. Ni el bueno de Capellán me dice ya que me arrepienta; me dio por perdido hace mucho. ¡Y mi viejo lo hizo mucho antes!». {n}Se ríe, nervioso.{/n} «Alto... ¿se refiere a ese "arrepentimiento"? ¿Esos estúpidos fantasmas o lo que fueran? Estoy convencido de que fueron cosa de mi padre senil, o, si no, era mi hija gastando una broma. ¿De dónde si no habría salido esa palabra?».

languages.text: 「わはは！んなことねえよ。あの教戒官でさえ俺に悔い改めろなんて言わない…とっくに諦めたんだろう。親父にいたっては、さらに昔に俺がまともになるのを諦めてるからな！」{n}彼は不安そうに笑った。{/n}「待てよ…”リペンタンス”ってあれか？幽霊だかが書き残していったってやつか？ありゃ親父がボケて書いたんだよ。それか、俺の娘が落書きしただけだ。でなきゃ誰の仕業だっていうんだ？」
languages.original_text: "Ha ha, ha ha ha, that's hilarious. Even good old Chaplain doesn't tell me to repent — he gave up on me long ago. And my old dad, he gave up on me long before that!" {n}He laughs nervously.{/n} "Wait... you mean that 'repentance'? Those stupid ghosts or whatever it was? I'm pretty sure my father did it himself, the senile old kook, or maybe it was my daughter messing around. Where else could those words have come from?"

traits.locale_text: 「わはは！んなことねえよ。あの教戒官でさえ俺に悔い改めろなんて言わない…とっくに諦めたんだろう。親父にいたっては、さらに昔に俺がまともになるのを諦めてるからな！」{n}彼は不安そうに笑った。{/n}「待てよ…”リペンタンス”ってあれか？幽霊だかが書き残していったってやつか？ありゃ親父がボケて書いたんだよ。それか、俺の娘が落書きしただけだ。でなきゃ誰の仕業だっていうんだ？」

languages.text: "Ha ha, ha ha ha, das ist köstlich! Selbst der gute alte Ordenspriester hält mich nicht zur Repentanz an – das hat er längst aufgegeben. Und mein alter Vater ebenso, schon lange vor ihm!" {n}Er lacht nervös.{/n} "Moment ... meint Ihr die 'Repentanz'? Diese dummen Geister oder was das war? Ich bin sicher, das war mein Vater selbst, der senile alte Knacker, oder vielleicht meine Tochter. Woher sollen diese Worte sonst gekommen sein?"
languages.original_text: "Ha ha, ha ha ha, that's hilarious. Even good old Chaplain doesn't tell me to repent — he gave up on me long ago. And my old dad, he gave up on me long before that!" {n}He laughs nervously.{/n} "Wait... you mean that 'repentance'? Those stupid ghosts or whatever it was? I'm pretty sure my father did it himself, the senile old kook, or maybe it was my daughter messing around. Where else could those words have come from?"

traits.locale_text: "Ha ha, ha ha ha, das ist köstlich! Selbst der gute alte Ordenspriester hält mich nicht zur Repentanz an – das hat er längst aufgegeben. Und mein alter Vater ebenso, schon lange vor ihm!" {n}Er lacht nervös.{/n} "Moment ... meint Ihr die 'Repentanz'? Diese dummen Geister oder was das war? Ich bin sicher, das war mein Vater selbst, der senile alte Knacker, oder vielleicht meine Tochter. Woher sollen diese Worte sonst gekommen sein?"

languages.text: « Ha ha, ha ha ha, la bonne blague ! Même le vieux Chapelain ne me parle pas de repentir. Voilà bien longtemps qu'il a abandonné l'idée. Quant à mon vieux père, il m'a abandonné bien avant ça ! {n}ajoute-t-il avec un rire nerveux.{/n} Attendez... Vous voulez parler de cette fameuse "repentance" ? Cette histoire de fantômes ? Je suis sûr que mon père a fait ça tout seul, dans ses délires séniles d'excentrique. Ou alors, c'était peut-être ma fille, pour s'amuser. Qui d'autre aurait pu écrire ces mots ? »
languages.original_text: "Ha ha, ha ha ha, that's hilarious. Even good old Chaplain doesn't tell me to repent — he gave up on me long ago. And my old dad, he gave up on me long before that!" {n}He laughs nervously.{/n} "Wait... you mean that 'repentance'? Those stupid ghosts or whatever it was? I'm pretty sure my father did it himself, the senile old kook, or maybe it was my daughter messing around. Where else could those words have come from?"

traits.locale_text: « Ha ha, ha ha ha, la bonne blague ! Même le vieux Chapelain ne me parle pas de repentir. Voilà bien longtemps qu'il a abandonné l'idée. Quant à mon vieux père, il m'a abandonné bien avant ça ! {n}ajoute-t-il avec un rire nerveux.{/n} Attendez... Vous voulez parler de cette fameuse "repentance" ? Cette histoire de fantômes ? Je suis sûr que mon père a fait ça tout seul, dans ses délires séniles d'excentrique. Ou alors, c'était peut-être ma fille, pour s'amuser. Qui d'autre aurait pu écrire ces mots ? »

languages.text: "Ha ha, ha ha ha, komikmiş. Bizim Papaz bile artık tövbe et demiyor, benden ümidi keseli çok oldu. Bizim ihtiyarsa ondan çok önce kesmişti zaten! {n}Gergince gülüyor.{/n} "Bir dakika. Şu 'tövbe'den mi bahsediyoruz? Aptal hayaletlerden ya da artık her neyse ondan?.. Kesin babamın işidir, bunak ihtiyar işte. O değilse kızım kafa buluyordur. O kelimeler başka nasıl belirecek?"
languages.original_text: "Ha ha, ha ha ha, that's hilarious. Even good old Chaplain doesn't tell me to repent — he gave up on me long ago. And my old dad, he gave up on me long before that!" {n}He laughs nervously.{/n} "Wait... you mean that 'repentance'? Those stupid ghosts or whatever it was? I'm pretty sure my father did it himself, the senile old kook, or maybe it was my daughter messing around. Where else could those words have come from?"

traits.locale_text: "Ha ha, ha ha ha, çok komikti. Bizim Papaz bile artık bana tövbe etmemi söylemiyor, uzun zaman önce benden ümidi kesti. Zavallı babam ondan çok önce ümidi kesmişti zaten! {n}Gergince gülüyor.{/n} "Bir dakika. Şu 'tövbe'den mi bahsediyoruz? Aptal hayaletlerden miydi, neydi onlar? Babamın yaptığına eminim, bunak ihtiyar işte. Belki de kızım onunla dalga geçiyordur. Başka nereden gelecek o kelimeler?"
